đức.definition:
People with this name prefer concrete facts over abstract theories. As a result, they tend to learn best by doing. They are [particularly] well-tuned into the emotions and feelings of others.

People with this name enjoy structure and strive to maintain this order in all areas of their lives. They thrive in highly structured and consistent environments where they are given step-by-step [instructions] and clear [expectations].

Their preference to keep things the way they are rather than change.
